about_the_game:
We’ve noticed many of you are looking for ways to further support the game and our team. To answer this, we’ve created the Supporter DLC. This fun little package is a treasure trove for fans, including exclusive digital goodies such as:
  • Digital art book
  • Unique in-game outfits
  • Golden token badge
  • ES wallpapers
  • The first playable ES prototype version
It’s our way of offering you something special in return for your incredible support!

Thank you!
-Pine team

FAQ:

Q: Where to find the digital artbook, wallpapers and the first ES prototype?
A: The easiest way is to right click on Escape Simulator in your Steam library > Manage > Browse local files. That should open the folder with all the digital goodies.

Q: How to play the first ES prototype?
A: unzip the EarlyPrototype.zip, find Escape Simulator.exe there and double click on it.

short_description: This fun little package is a treasure trove for fans, including exclusive in-game outfit, a golden token badge, a digital art book, ES wallpapers, and even the first playable ES prototype version. It’s our way of offering you something special in return for your incredible support!
